column4: Gv- becomes Gvy- before a vowel.
Ijv- becomes Ijvy- before a vowel.
Sgị- becomes Sgw- before a vowel.
Isgi- becomes Isgiy- before a vowel.

column6: He wants you all and me.
He and I see you all.
You all and I see him.
You all and I see it.
You all and I want it.
You all and I see them.
You all and I see them.
You all and I want them.

column4: Ijv- becomes Ijvy- before a vowel.

column6: You two see me and another.

column4: Isgi- becomes Isgiy- before a vowel.
column6: You two see them and me.
Isgi- becomes Isgiy- before a vowel.

column4: Isgi- becomes Isgiy- before a vowel.
column6: You all see him and me.
They see you all and me.

column4: Vgi- becomes Vgw- before a vowel.

column6: He and I are being seen.
You and I are being seen.
They and I are being seen.
You all and I are being seen.
You all and I see ourselves.
You all and I see ourselves.
